org.apache.paimon.utils

Class JsonSerdeUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.paimon.utils.JsonSerdeUtil

  • public class JsonSerdeUtil
extends Object
    A utility class that provide abilities for JSON serialization and deserialization.

      • getNodeAs

        @Nullable
public static <T extends org.apache.paimon.shade.jackson2.com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode> T getNodeAs(org.apache.paimon.shade.jackson2.com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode root,
                                                                                                                         String fieldName,
                                                                                                                         Class<T> clazz)
        Retrieves a specific node from the given root node and casts it to the specified type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the node to be returned.
        Parameters:
        root - The root node from which the specific node is to be retrieved.
        fieldName - The name of the field to retrieve.
        clazz - The class of the node to be returned.
        Returns:
        The node cast to the specified type or null if not present.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the node is not of the expected type.

      • asSpecificNodeType

        public static <T extends org.apache.paimon.shade.jackson2.com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode> T asSpecificNodeType(String json,
                                                                                                                        Class<T> clazz)
                                                                                                                 throws org.apache.paimon.shade.jackson2.com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
        Parses the provided JSON string and casts it to the specified type of JsonNode.

        This method is useful when the exact subtype of JsonNode is known beforehand and needs to be enforced.

        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the JsonNode to return. Must be a subtype of JsonNode.
        Parameters:
        json - The JSON string to parse.
        clazz - The expected class type of the parsed JSON.
        Returns:
        The parsed JSON as an instance of the specified type.
        Throws:
        org.apache.paimon.shade.jackson2.com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - If there's an error during JSON parsing.
        IllegalArgumentException - If the parsed JSON is not of the expected type.

      • extractValueOrDefault
